channel.title: Buggy HP system, should be easy to fix to someone smart! :) fixed now :)
channel.description:
basically, when i do ::master on my server my hp buggs and it stays at 10hp even if i die, log out, anything....
i found a way to fix it, by editing the hp manually in the char files, but as i want to get the server public, i dont want to have to change everybodys char files everytime someone joins.
once i edit the line to this everything works as it should
character-skill = 3 99 200000000
and this is what it stays at when i dont manually edit it
character-skill = 3 10 200000000
also while its bugged at 10/99hp you cannot eat food or anything.
any ideas on how to fix it anyone?
thanks in advance :)

item.title: Buggy HP system, should be easy to fix to someone smart! :) fixed now :)
item.dc:creator: @korey1993 korey1993
item.description:
@korey1993 wrote:

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("master") && playerRights >= 2) { for(int i = 0; i < 21; i++) { addSkillXP(200000000, i); }

base is delta btw, forgot to add that lol

Read full topic
item.source: Buggy HP system, should be easy to fix to someone smart! :) fixed now :)
